Base:InitialProperties.Base:InitialProperty: "react:descsub"
"react:read"
"run"
"if \$prop(this.trait:metal) = none then set this.trait:brief to metal else set this.trait:brief to \$prop(this.trait:metal)"
"if \$prop(this.trait:variant) \<\> nil then set this.trait:brief to \$prop(this.trait:brief) \$prop(this.trait:variant)"

"set this.trait:brief to \$prop(this.trait:brief) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) :: set this.trait:look to \$sam(\) :: if \$prop(this.trait:design) = none then set this.trait:look to \$prop(this.trait:look). else set this.trait:look to \$prop(this.trait:look) of \$prop(this.trait:design) design."
"if \$prop(this.trait:metal) = none then set this.trait:examine to A metal else set this.trait:examine to \$sam(\)"
"if \$prop(this.trait:variant) \<\> nil then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) \$prop(this.trait:variant)"

"set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) :: if \$prop(this.trait:design) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) of \$prop(this.trait:design) design"

"if \$prop(this.trait:color) = none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine), about 25 inches in length, with a leather-wrapped grip, square guard and else set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine), about 38 inches in length, with \$sam(\) leather-wrapped grip, square guard and"
"if \$prop(this.trait:stone) = none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) disc pommel. else set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) a disc pommel set with \$sam(\)."

"set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) The edges and tip of the blade are blunted for safe practice :: if \$prop(this.trait:symbol) = none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine). else set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine), and one side is engraved with \$sam(\) near the guard."
"if \$prop(this.trait:mastermark) \<\> nil then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) You note the professional mark of \$prop(this.trait:mastermark)."
"set this.xdesc to \$sam(\) :: set this.trait:brief:blade to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) blade :: set this.trait:look:blade to A tapered blade on \$prop(this.xdesc)."

"set this.trait:examine:blade to \$prop(this.trait:look:blade) The edges and tip are blunted for safe practice. :: if \$prop(this.trait:symbol) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine:blade to \$prop(this.trait:examine:blade) It is engraved with \$sam(\) near the guard."
"if \$prop(this.trait:mastermark) \<\> nil then set this.trait:examine:blade to \$prop(this.trait:examine:blade) You note the professional mark of \$prop(this.trait:mastermark)."
"set this.trait:brief:pommel to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) pommel :: if \$prop(this.trait:stone) = none then set this.trait:look:pommel to A else set this.trait:look:pommel to \$sam(\)"

"set this.trait:look:pommel to \$prop(this.trait:look:pommel) pommel on \$prop(this.xdesc). :: if \$prop(this.trait:stone) = none then set this.trait:examine:pommel to \$prop(this.trait:look:pommel) else set this.trait:examine:pommel to A pommel on \$prop(this.xdesc), set with \$sam(\)."
"set this.trait:brief:hilt to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) hilt :: set this.trait:look:hilt to A hilt on \$prop(this.xdesc)."

"if \$prop(this.trait:color) = none then set this.trait:examine:hilt to A hilt on \$prop(this.xdesc), consisting of a leather-wrapped grip, a square guard and a pommel. else set this.trait:examine:hilt to A hilt on \$prop(this.xdesc), consisting of \$sam(\) leather-wrapped grip, a square guard and a pommel."
"if \$prop(this.trait:stone) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine:hilt to \$prop(this.trait:examine:hilt) The pommel is set with \$sam(\)."

"set this.trait:brief:guard to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) guard :: set this.trait:look:guard to A guard on \$prop(this.xdesc). :: set this.trait:examine:guard to A six-inch metal bar, mounted between the grip and blade of \$prop(this.xdesc)."

"set this.trait:brief:grip to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) grip :: set this.trait:look:grip to A grip on \$prop(this.xdesc). :: if \$prop(this.trait:color) = none then set this.trait:examine:grip to A grip on \$prop(this.xdesc), wrapped with leather. else set this.trait:examine:grip to A grip on \$prop(this.xdesc), wrapped with \$prop(this.trait:color) leather."

"if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) = nil then goto 0220 else if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) The inscription \\"\$prop(this.trait:inscription)\\" has been skillfully executed near the hilt."
"set this.xdesc to nil :: return"
"run"
"if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) = nil then exit true else if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) = none then exit true else if \$obj(actor) = \$obj(env.this) then goto 0030"
"emit.actor You must be holding \$brief(this) to do that. :: exit false"
"emit.actor The inscription \\"\$prop(this.trait:inscription)\\" is visible upon \$brief(this). :: exit false"

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "react:descsub"
"react:read"
"run"
"if \$prop(this.trait:metal) = none then set this.trait:brief to metal else set this.trait:brief to \$prop(this.trait:metal)"
"if \$prop(this.trait:variant) \<\> nil then set this.trait:brief to \$prop(this.trait:brief) \$prop(this.trait:variant)"

"set this.trait:brief to \$prop(this.trait:brief) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) :: set this.trait:look to \$sam(\) :: if \$prop(this.trait:design) = none then set this.trait:look to \$prop(this.trait:look). else set this.trait:look to \$prop(this.trait:look) of \$prop(this.trait:design) design."
"if \$prop(this.trait:metal) = none then set this.trait:examine to A metal else set this.trait:examine to \$sam(\)"
"if \$prop(this.trait:variant) \<\> nil then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) \$prop(this.trait:variant)"

"set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) :: if \$prop(this.trait:design) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) of \$prop(this.trait:design) design"

"if \$prop(this.trait:color) = none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine), about 25 inches in length, with a leather-wrapped grip, square guard and else set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine), about 38 inches in length, with \$sam(\) leather-wrapped grip, square guard and"
"if \$prop(this.trait:stone) = none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) disc pommel. else set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) a disc pommel set with \$sam(\)."

"set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) The edges and tip of the blade are blunted for safe practice :: if \$prop(this.trait:symbol) = none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine). else set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine), and one side is engraved with \$sam(\) near the guard."
"if \$prop(this.trait:mastermark) \<\> nil then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) You note the professional mark of \$prop(this.trait:mastermark)."
"set this.xdesc to \$sam(\) :: set this.trait:brief:blade to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) blade :: set this.trait:look:blade to A tapered blade on \$prop(this.xdesc)."

"set this.trait:examine:blade to \$prop(this.trait:look:blade) The edges and tip are blunted for safe practice. :: if \$prop(this.trait:symbol) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine:blade to \$prop(this.trait:examine:blade) It is engraved with \$sam(\) near the guard."
"if \$prop(this.trait:mastermark) \<\> nil then set this.trait:examine:blade to \$prop(this.trait:examine:blade) You note the professional mark of \$prop(this.trait:mastermark)."
"set this.trait:brief:pommel to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) pommel :: if \$prop(this.trait:stone) = none then set this.trait:look:pommel to A else set this.trait:look:pommel to \$sam(\)"

"set this.trait:look:pommel to \$prop(this.trait:look:pommel) pommel on \$prop(this.xdesc). :: if \$prop(this.trait:stone) = none then set this.trait:examine:pommel to \$prop(this.trait:look:pommel) else set this.trait:examine:pommel to A pommel on \$prop(this.xdesc), set with \$sam(\)."
"set this.trait:brief:hilt to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) hilt :: set this.trait:look:hilt to A hilt on \$prop(this.xdesc)."

"if \$prop(this.trait:color) = none then set this.trait:examine:hilt to A hilt on \$prop(this.xdesc), consisting of a leather-wrapped grip, a square guard and a pommel. else set this.trait:examine:hilt to A hilt on \$prop(this.xdesc), consisting of \$sam(\) leather-wrapped grip, a square guard and a pommel."
"if \$prop(this.trait:stone) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine:hilt to \$prop(this.trait:examine:hilt) The pommel is set with \$sam(\)."

"set this.trait:brief:guard to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) guard :: set this.trait:look:guard to A guard on \$prop(this.xdesc). :: set this.trait:examine:guard to A six-inch metal bar, mounted between the grip and blade of \$prop(this.xdesc)."

"set this.trait:brief:grip to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) grip :: set this.trait:look:grip to A grip on \$prop(this.xdesc). :: if \$prop(this.trait:color) = none then set this.trait:examine:grip to A grip on \$prop(this.xdesc), wrapped with leather. else set this.trait:examine:grip to A grip on \$prop(this.xdesc), wrapped with \$prop(this.trait:color) leather."

"if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) = nil then goto 0220 else if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) The inscription \\"\$prop(this.trait:inscription)\\" has been skillfully executed near the hilt."
"set this.xdesc to nil :: return"
"run"
"if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) = nil then exit true else if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) = none then exit true else if \$obj(actor) = \$obj(env.this) then goto 0030"
"emit.actor You must be holding \$brief(this) to do that. :: exit false"
"emit.actor The inscription \\"\$prop(this.trait:inscription)\\" is visible upon \$brief(this). :: exit false"
(\{ 1088170557, "ladysilverwolf", "E" \})
